item.title: TikTok Star Juju ‘Straw Hat Goofy’ Green Joins iHeartMedia as Key Entertainment Contributor
item.description: Juju Green, better known by his social media handle “Straw Hat Goofy,” has joined iHeartMedia as key entertainment contributor. Green has earned the title of TikTok’s “Movie Guy,” building an audience
